features: DURABLE&GOOD QUALITY:16OZ canvas is eco-friendly and durable. This bag becomes more high-end with high quality of nylon lining.

PLENTY SPACE & GOOD ORGANIZATION：13”*14.6”*4.7”(L*H*W).Plenty space to hold lots of stuff for daily necessities such as ipad, calculator, pens, pencils, books, glasses, water-bottle, cell phone, cards, tissues, MP3 player, etc.

FEATURES: 1* main pocket , 2*front pocket with buckle, 1*side zipper pocket. Adjustable padded shoulder straps for comfort. Strap is from 55cm to 120cm, shoulder width of about 7cm. Good hand feel and Light pack.
APPLICATION:Shopping,traveling, workout, walking and any other occasions.. perfect festival or birthday gift for women.

THE BEST CHOICE OF GIFT : Any problem you have with the bag, please contact us. We will solve the problem. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag, great price.
reviews.reviewText: Phenomenal bag! Got it and put it to immediate use. I'm a guy, so I get some one-off looks carrying around a bag like this in the midwest, but I also got two compliments on it. Sure, the english on the front is a bit janky and doesn't make sense, but it's incredibly well built. Zippers are sturdy, the buckles are actual bronze\copper, not cheap plastic, and the leather feels great. Holds a full sized iPad air, which is great.The side-mesh holds a 6" phone, or a thin bottle of water, but I personally think it's great for my phone. The pocket with the snap on it is a bit small for most things, but it does fit my utility knife nicely, which keeps it in close grasp.There are four main pouches on this bag:1. The main pouch is the one that you can access after unbuckling and flipping the flap up. Fairly large, holds a full sized iPad (10.5") without issue, as well as whatever else will fit. Also fits a full-sized 5" revolver with holster, with room for more.2. The second pouch is a zipper behind the main pouch, which is a bit narrow, but has the same depth as the main pouch.3. Third pouch is a zipper unit as well, and fits my keys\smaller tablet (Kindle 6") and random things like my wallet or work ID.4. Fourth pouch is simply an open pocket on the front of third pouch, and it's good for keeping smaller things like candy\redbull\wallet\ID in as well.When it arrived, I was concerned over the size of the strap, but it expanded nicely, and fits my frame (6'1") without issue, and slings down nicely over my hip.Over-all, for the price, this bag has a great style and is absolutely functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I chose this bag cause it kinda reminded me of a western saddle bag. Quality seems good and construction also seems good. Kinda wonky on me cause I’m shaped like a light pole but it serves my purpose well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall GREAT Bag! Disappointing External Pockets, Though.
reviews.reviewText: I truly like this bag, this purse, this man-bag, this murse, this whatever. Materials and build quality so far (a week or so of daily use into my ownership) seem solid. It looks great and holds everything that I need it to. Currently mine contains, wallet (I love having my pockets empty!), sunglasses, prescription glasses in a hard-case, Galaxy Tab 3 (in the zippered pocket), house keys, car keys, LED flashlight, Leatherman multi-tool, large Swiss Army Knife, and an assortment of miscellaneous items like contacts, Square reader, flash drive, pen, cigarettes (don't judge), lighter, etc...The main compartment is fantastic in its capacity and small zippered pocket (where my wallet lives). The larger zippered pocket outside the main compartment fits my Galaxy Tab 3; even with the ginormous Otter Box case, there is room to spare. The smaller pocket outside of that holds a pack of cigarettes, business cards, random slim/smallish stuff.The reason why I have only rated it 4 stars, is the size of the external pockets. They are far too small and I've had to be creative to make them practical. The mesh pockets appear to be made for water bottles, coffee mugs, whatever... Standard sized mugs or water bottles will not fit. In fact, the mesh pockets are so small and tight that the sunglasses that I store in one of them are an extremely tight fit and getting them into and out of the pocket is a two-handed exercise that's still a bit of a struggle. The other mesh pocket, I'm using to hold a small LED flashlight and car key. Again, the mouth is so narrow and tight that getting my semi-largish fingers inside of it is not as convenient as I'd like.Additionally, the small utility pocket next to the main compartment is likewise disappointingly small. Currently I have the Leatherman multi-tool and the Swiss Army Knife in this pocket, as I can't think of any other practical use for it.Overall, GREAT bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bag has won my heart! Its size is just right, and its stylish appearance adds to its appeal. My only suggestion would be to enlarge one of the side mesh pockets to accommodate a small water bottle. Despite using the bag regularly for a year, it remains in excellent condition. Without a doubt, I would gladly purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my husband. He loves it. It's lightweight and can hold keys, wallet, phone and have room to spare. Very masculine. He gets a lot of compliments on it from other men.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite Pleased Actually
reviews.reviewText: I got the large-size black one. Yes, there is some kind of ‘Chinglish’ or ‘Hindi’ gobbledygook lightly embossed on the front—just saying where it was manufactured “Kokkukou” and a wisnomer “We Are Our Choices”. It doesn’t look bad—barely noticeable on my black-colored version. This was just what I was looking for to carry my stuff around/on the plane, etc. I just wear it around my neck and over one shoulder—looks cool and functions well. Last time I was in a foreign city—just walking down the street—half of my belongings got taken from my back-pack by some little kids before I even knew what was going on—‘chest packs’ are where it’s at, trust me. Seems quite sturdy but Cheap enough to replace should I need. I’d like to have this bag in an ‘all leather’ design some day—but the cost might be too high.
Siempre he comprado esta marca, pero en esta ocasión me decepcionaron por la mala calidad del producto, ya la regresé y estoy en espera del reembolso, este modelo lindo recomiendo
Me encantó, solo un detalle, uno de los broches no cierra, pero igual lo recomiendo, me gusto bastante
I like the convince. Keeps me organized.
